data.title: Largest airports and airlines in the United Kingdom
data.meta_description: The 30 biggest airports in the United Kingdom and 9 airlines with further information and data
data.text:
The 30 largest airports and airlines in the United Kingdom

Further information is provided on the 30 biggest airports in the United Kingdom. At London Heathrow Airport alone, 86 airlines operate and serve flights to and from 171 destinations.

Out of the 13 airlines of the country we have listed biggest 9. EasyJet is leading here with a total of 136 flight destinations.

› Transport + infrastructure in the United Kingdom

› The largest airports worldwide
